edu.holycross.shot.jmorph
[Groovy] Class MorphSql

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.jmorph.MorphSql

class MorphSql

A class for working with morphological data sets using in an SQL system.

Constructor Detail

MorphSql

MorphSql()
Empty constructor initializes sqllite database instance.

MorphSql

MorphSql(java.io.File stemCsv, java.io.File endingsCsv, java.io.File stemTypesCsv, java.io.File inflClassesCsv)
Constructor destructively initializes sqllite from source files for four required tables. Existing tables are dropped, recreated, and new data loaded from the source tables. Source tables are in csv format with a header line that is ignored.
Parameters:
stemCsv - Database of morphological stems.
endingsCsv - Database of morphological endings.
stemTypes - Specific types of morphological stems, linked to broader inflectional classes. While the broader inflectional class determines what set of endings to apply, the specific stem type determines in more detail how those endings are applied.
inflClassesCsv - Database of broader inflectional classes determining what endings to apply

loadEndings

void loadEndings(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads morphological endings data from a csv file. Replaces any existing data by recreating the endings table before loading new data from csvFile.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with endings data in csv format.

loadInflectionalClasses

void loadInflectionalClasses(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads morphological stem types from a csv file. Replaces any existing data by recreating the inflclass table before loading new data from csvFile.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with endings data in csv format.

loadLexicon

void loadLexicon(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads lexicon data from a csv file. By default, replaces any existing lexicon, by using the overloaded signature to ask explicitly to load the lexicon by replacing, not appending, existing data.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with lexicon data in csv format.

loadLexicon

void loadLexicon(java.io.File csvFile, boolean append)
Loads lexicon data from a csv file.
Parameters:
append - True if existing lexicon data should be kept. If append is false, the lexicon table is recreated with only the data from csvFile.
csvFile - File with lexicon data in csv format.

loadStemTypes

void loadStemTypes(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads morphological stem types from a csv file. Replaces any existing data by recreating the stemtype table before loading new data from csvFile.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with endings data in csv format.

loadStems

void loadStems(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads morphological stems data from a csv file. Replaces any existing data by recreating the morphstem table before loading new data from csvFile.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with endings data in csv format.

loadTags

void loadTags(java.io.File csvFile)
Loads tag data from a csv file.
Parameters:
csvFile - File with lexicon data in csv format.
